author: joeyaiello
body:
Need to document [GetSteppablePipeline](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.management.automation.scriptblock.getsteppablepipeline) since @KirkMunro made it public back in #8055.

Spoke to @SteveL-MSFT about this, he's okay with .NET SDK reference documentation bugs living here given that they need to be fixed in `///` comments here in the code repo.

That being said, we don't think there will be a lot of these.

Related to MicrosoftDocs/PowerShell-Docs#3128

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Why do you reference ScriptBlock.GetSteppablePipeline() if [PowerShel.(GetSteppablePipeline)](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.management.automation.powershell.getsteppablepipeline?view=pscore-6.2.0) was made public?

title: Document GetSteppablePipeline
